title: Adult Rejection Sensitivity Questionnaire (A-RSQ)
description: Please imagine yourself in each of the following situations and answer the two questions in each situation provided.
name: page1

elements.name: situation1
elements.title: Situation 1: You ask your parents or another family member for a loan to help you through a difficult financial time.

elements.name: 1_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not they would want to give you a loan?

elements.name: 1_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that they would give me a loan without much problem.

elements.name: situation2
elements.title: Situation 2: You approach a close friend to talk after doing or saying something that seriously upset them.

elements.name: 2_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your friend would want to talk with you?

elements.name: 2_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that they would want to talk with me to sort out the problem.

elements.name: situation3
elements.title: Situation 3: You ask your partner to move in with you.

elements.name: 3_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your partner would want to move in with you?

elements.name: 3_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that my partner would agree to move in with me.

elements.name: situation4
elements.title: Situation 4: You ask someone you donâ€™t know very well out on a date.

elements.name: 4_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not they would want to go out with you?

elements.name: 4_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that they would want to go out with me.

elements.name: situation5
elements.title: Situation 5: After an argument, you call your partner to apologize and suggest meeting to work things out.

elements.name: 5_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your partner would want to accept your apology?

elements.name: 5_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that my partner would accept my apology and agree to meet.

elements.name: situation6
elements.title: Situation 6: You ask your boss for some extra time off from work.

elements.name: 6_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your boss would give you the time off?

elements.name: 6_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that my boss would give me the extra time off without much problem.

elements.name: situation7
elements.title: Situation 7: You ask a friend to do you a big favor.

elements.name: 7_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your friend would be willing to do this favor?

elements.name: 7_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that my friend would willingly do this favor for me.

elements.name: situation8
elements.title: Situation 8: You call up a friend to ask if you can stay with them for a few days while visiting their city.

elements.name: 8_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your friend would let you stay with them?

elements.name: 8_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that my friend would let me stay with them without much hesitation.

elements.name: situation9
elements.title: Situation 9: You ask someone in one of your classes or at work to join you for coffee afterwards.

elements.name: 9_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not they would want to have coffee with you?

elements.name: 9_expectancy
elements.title: I expect that they would agree to have coffee with me.
